home.title: TAPSOBA Abdoul Kader
home.subtitle: Data Scientist | Web and Mobile Developer | Software Engineer
home.description: Passionate about data analysis and innovative solutions, I aim to contribute to strategic projects as a Data Analyst, leveraging my skills in machine learning, data visualization, and predictive analysis to anticipate trends and add value to business decisions.

one.title: Power BI: Create and Share Your First Dashboard

two.title: Microsoft Certified: Power BI Data Analyst Associate

list.one: Data analysis and Machine Learning with Python

one.title: Power BI Trainer – PL-300 and PL-900
one.description: Conducted a 5-day practical training on using Power BI for data analytics and creating interactive reports. Preparation for PL-300 and PL-900 certifications.

two.title: Web Developer and Data Scientist
two.description: Design and development of a management and assistance application for migration to Canada. Implementation of an intelligent recommendation system and data analysis to improve application performance.

three.title: Data Scientist
three.description: Analysis of Burkinabe population migrations due to conflict and climate change. Development of an AI model for predicting migration flow and a decision-making tool on conflict, migration, and food security.

four.title: Data Scientist
four.description: Collection and preparation of meteorological data. Data analysis for a better understanding of weather in West Africa. Development of a temperature prediction system using Machine Learning and Deep Learning.

five.title: Mobile Developer
five.description: As part of a doctoral project, I participated in the design and development of the Haala mobile application, which aims to break the language barrier between doctors and their patients by enabling them to communicate and understand each other despite language differences.

six.title: Web and Mobile Developer
six.description: My mission in this position was to develop and implement a web platform for managing personnel and their missions for the private structures that were the company's clients.

seven.title: Web Developer Intern
seven.description: The objective of this internship was the analysis, design, and implementation of a national-scale Geoportal for the host organization. It was realized and strengthened the partnership between IGB and Université Nazi Boni.

eight.title: Software Developer
eight.description: During my studies, I participated in software development projects such as a school management software and a restaurant management software.

nine.title: Data Analyst
nine.description: My tasks in this position were to digitize information received from companies collected in paper format and then perform statistical analysis of this data to show trends and help address real challenges.

ten.title: Software Developer and Data Scientist
ten.description: Intellectus is a tech startup set up with classmates. As a co-founder, technical manager, software developer, and data scientist, I was in charge of developing client and partner software, analyzing their data to recommend promising solutions and AI models if necessary for their better evolution.

one.title: Faso Migration
one.description: Web platform for analyzing migration flow in Burkina Faso and forecasting future migrations for better decision-making.

two.title: Climate Model
two.description: Collection, preparation, and analysis of meteorological data. Development of AI models for completing missing data and weather prediction.

three.title: RifkaStore
three.description: Web and mobile e-commerce application inspired by the Grand Market of Ouagadougou.

four.title: Reemix Play
four.description: Mobile application for music and video streaming with social features.

five.title: EventBook
five.description: Mobile application for tracking, sharing, and publishing events.

six.title: Bon contact
six.description: Mobile professional social network with instant messaging and opportunity sharing.

seven.title: GPS Mobile
seven.description: Mobile GPS application for capturing coordinates of points, lines, or polygons like a professional GPS.

eight.title: Tontine Moderne
eight.description: Web platform for managing tontine funds and keeping participants informed.

nine.title: App Analpha
nine.description: Mobile application for managing contacts for illiterate individuals, enabling easy contact creation and calling.

ten.title: Geoportail
ten.description: Web platform for creating, processing, and visualizing maps at a national scale for Burkina Faso.

eleven.title: Bassin Gap
eleven.description: Preparation and analysis of WASCAL basin data to identify missing periods and anomalies.

twelve.title: Terrain Projet
twelve.description: Simple interface for calculating areas for development and plantation projects allocated to partners by WASCAL.

thirteen.title: Parc National Moyen Bafing
thirteen.description: Analysis of climatic data in the park region in Guinea, followed by a literature review on nature-based solutions (NbS) favoring women and girls.
